statements: DELETE FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE hotel_id = 101 AND check_in_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE check_out_date < '2022-06-30' AND room_price > 150.00;

DELETE FROM pricing_trends WHERE price >= 1000 AND price_date < '2022-12-01';
DELETE FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE occupancy_date <= '2022-01-01' AND occupancy_rate < 50;
DELETE FROM pricing_trends WHERE hotel_id = 1002 AND pricing_date >= '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM occupancy WHERE hotel_id = 2001 AND occupancy_date = '2022-10-15';
